violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements

discussion.author: rafaqz
discussion.text: [noblock] the reason the name is all uppercase is that this is the exact name of the DE9IM predicate standard, widely used with spatial data.

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: [noblock] I think the name is fine, but youâ€™ll have to ask for a manual merge on Slack at the end of the three-day period.
